thread.title: dave walsh
thread.title_full: PLUS WATCH recensione scritta da dave walsh

author: dave walsh
title: dave walsh
text: I purchased a Tag Heur Link Calibre 16 in mint condition. It was better than advertised, as new for cheaper than it would have retailed at on the high street. The whole transaction was seamless and the delivery timeframe exceeded all expectations. I would not hesitate to use this company again and would recommend them to anyone interested in purchasing / investing in a luxury watch. Thanks again for a wonderful customer experience.
